title: Status
field_yw_text_content: I am currently available for freelance work. If you have a project that you want to get started. Please get in touch.

title: Develope
field_yw_text_content: I am a developer. I can develop a website that meets your requirement. I use current trends and technology. That fits in all type of devices.

title: Design
field_yw_text_content: My goal would be focusing on content, suitable font-type, colour combination, Images and conveying the message that you would like to send. I prefer simplicity inÂ design keeping in mind Visual Hierarchy, consistency and scale. I believe on design is a personal matter. I will design the way you like.

title: Introduction
field_yw_text_content: I am a web designer/developer. I am based in London, UK. Designing is my passion. I enjoying designing and developing websites.
